body.name: OMBAR Dash Cam Front and Rear 4K/2K/1080P+1080P 5G WiFi GPS, Dash Camera for Cars with Free 64G SD Card, Dual Dash Cam with WDR Night Vision, 24h Parking Mode,170°Wide, G-Sensor, Loop Recording, APP
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 1 hr 43 mins
features: 【Dash Cam Front and Rear】The OMBAR DC42 dual dash cam can record videos in front UHD 4K (3840*2160P -170° wide angle), and rear FHD 1080P (1920*1080P-150° wide angle) resolution, clearly capturing license plates and road signs. You can switch to front view in 4K, 2K or 1080P. Front dashcam can be used alone. Note: Do not plug or unplug the rear camera during use, disconnect the dashcam's power first before operating.

【WDR & Super Night Vision】OMBAR dual dash cam adopts the Super Night Vision Technology (NT96670 chipset + GC4653 sensor), with F1.8 aperture and WDR, helps to get clearer footage and images from the recording in low light condition.

【Built-in 5G WiFi, GPS & App Control】The dash cam has built-in Dual-Band WiFi (2.4GHz & 5.0GHz) for faster transfer speed (not support remotely view live on your phone from home, effective WiFi signal range is about 25ft). Free app "Kacam", allowing you to easily control the dash cam, view, download (Support iPhone & Android), or share videos. Internal GPS records your driving route and speed. Note: cannot be used as GPS navigation.(GPS Player download please contact us by your Amazon order)

【Reliable Witness for Accident】With 64G TF card provided(inserted), dashcam won't lose any crucial evidence with loop recording, max up to 512GB (Must formate the SD card before first-time use); G-sensor auto detect a collision and lock the file to prevent that from an overwrite; 24Hrs parking mode require hardwire kit (Asin：B0BL6YMCN9, NOT included); Super capacitor (without battery)：-4° to 158°F, the working temperature is -20℃ to 70℃, so it is normal for your camera to run slightly hot.

【Warranty & Support】Dash cam front and rear must be powered by cigarette lighter port, so it comes with wires(must ALWAYS connect with power when using). Note: Wi-Fi doesn't mean wireless, only for connection between your phone with dash camera when you need to view videos by phone. The car camera comes with a full 12 months warranty, if you have any question regarding your product, please do not hesitate to contact us via Amazon, after-sale service is 7/24 on standby.

What are the advantages of 5G WiFi? For 4K dash cam, 2.4G wifi could not meet requirements, the transmission speed of 5G is about 2-4 times that of 2.4G. Pls short Press 3 times WiFi button in a row to shift to 2.4GHz if your phone can't search DC42 WiFi. How do I get my rear cam to work? It's not showing in the app. Make sure you plug the rear camera in while the main camera is not connected to power. If had this problem, we suggest that disconnect it, unplug the front one from power, the plug the rear one back in and then the front one to power last. What is the difference between H.265 and H.264? The main difference is that HEVC (H.265) allows for further reduced file size. H.264 (AVC) can be chosen for compatibility with older desktop and mobile devices. We recommend VLC Media Player on PC to play videos. How to use parking monitoring function? For using dash cam's parking monitor function, it requires 24h hardwire kit (not included), you can purchase it by searching Asin: B0BL6YMCN9. What should I pay attention to when using it for the first time? Pls tear off the protective film on all camera before using the dash cam for the first time. Before first time use, you MUST formate the SD card. (reverse insertion will result in damage to the card slot.) More Details Pls Refer To the Manual.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install and works fine!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I recently regretted not having a camera installed when I got into an accident. Until now, I’ve always had dash cams installed by professionals at a car shop, so discovering I could do it myself was a revelation. After some research and tutorials on YouTube, I found that installing one is quite straightforward, especially if you manage to hide the wires properly. It was a valuable learning experience. What’s great is that this can be done for under $100 without any installation fees, making it an affordable option for basic needs.To my surprise, despite its budget-friendly price, the dash cam does not look cheap at all and has a premium appearance. It came with a tool for removing car parts, like a pry bar, and included two spare 3M stickers, which means I can easily reuse it if I switch cars. While the camera boasts 4K quality, it’s not exceptionally clear, but it’s more than sufficient for reading license plates of surrounding cars, which is crucial. Initially, I found the startup sound a bit loud, but I was able to easily adjust the settings through its app. The built-in Wi-Fi allows for live viewing on my smartphone, although it can be a bit sluggish. Sometimes, the app crashes when I try to view recorded footage, but unless it’s necessary, it might not be worth the hassle to use. Considering its price, cost-performance ratio, and quality, I highly recommend this product. As someone who is not very knowledgeable about cars, I found the installation process to be straightforward and believe anyone can install it. I plan to buy another one for my husband’s car!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dashcam with excellent features and quality
reviews.reviewText: I bought this car dashcam after reading many positive reviews online and I am very happy with my purchase. The dashcam is easy to install and use, and the video quality is excellent. It records both the front and rear views of the road, and has a wide-angle lens that captures everything. The dashcam also has a night vision mode that works well in low-light conditions. The dashcam automatically saves the footage in case of a collision or a sudden brake, and has a loop recording feature that overwrites the oldest files when the memory card is full. The dashcam also has a built-in GPS that records the speed and location of the vehicle, and a Wi-Fi function that allows me to view and download the videos on my smartphone. The only thing I wish is that the cables are longer, as they are a bit short for my car. Other than that, I have no complaints about this dashcam. It is a great device that gives me peace of mind and security on the road. I highly recommend it to anyone who is looking for a reliable and affordable car dash-cam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent product, performance and price!
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a dashcam that had a rear camera also, and there is just so many to choose from. I read the description, reviews on this one along with the price, I decided to buy.It came quickly and nicely packaged. Quality feel to the camera. Easy installation, phone app is very nice. Recordings are crisp and clear. Overall, In my opinion, this is a quality built dashcam with outstanding performance. great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars amazing for new drivers!
reviews.reviewText: this dash cam is amazing for new drivers! i am a new driver and it makes me feel so safe! it records from the front and back. i put the camera behind my mirror and you can’t even tell it’s there!! the quality of the videos is so clear. this camera is definitely worth the money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional Dashcam with Superior Performance
reviews.reviewText: I've had the pleasure of using the OMBAR Dash Cam for several months now, and it's proven to be an indispensable addition to my daily drives. This sleek and efficient dashcam has exceeded all expectations, delivering exceptional performance and unparalleled reliability.Video Quality:The video quality is nothing short of astounding. Capturing footage in crystal-clear 4K resolution, even in low-light conditions, it ensures every detail on the road is vividly recorded. The wide-angle lens provides an expansive view, capturing not just the road ahead but also peripheral details crucial for a comprehensive recording.Reliability:One of the standout features is its reliability. The dashcam has never failed to start recording when needed. Its G-sensor technology detects sudden movements or impacts, automatically saving footage in a separate folder to prevent overwrite, ensuring crucial moments are always preserved.User-Friendly Interface:Setting up and operating this dashcam is a breeze. The intuitive interface makes navigation effortless, and the responsive controls allow for quick adjustments while driving. The included instructions are clear and concise, making installation hassle-free.Conclusion:In summary, the OMBAR Dash Cam is an outstanding investment for any driver seeking reliability, high-quality footage, and ease of use. Its exceptional performance, reliability, and user-friendly interface make it a top-tier choice in the dashcam market.Pros:Superb video qualityReliability with G-sensor technologyUser-friendly interfaceParking mode for added securityDurable build qualityCons:Cons:To use 24h Parking Mode you need to buy OMBAR Dash Cam Hardwire Kit separately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best All Around
reviews.reviewText: This is just what the doctor ordered. I've had no problems with this unit in the past 4 months. It was easy for me to install, and I saved a lot of money. It does everything I expected it to do, and the quality of the images is very good. It doesn't take up much room behind the mirror. It doesn't have a monitor and I thought that might be a problem, but it wasn't. You don't need a monitor. It connects to the cell phone, the software is easy to use, and works very well. I am very impressed with this unit.
